statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerCommunicationRecords;
SELECT customer_id, communication_type FROM CustomerCommunicationRecords WHERE communication_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT communication_content FROM CustomerCommunicationRecords WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM CustomerCommunicationRecords ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, communication_type FROM CustomerCommunicationRecords WHERE communication_type = 'Email' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM CustomerCommunicationRecords WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, communication_type FROM CustomerCommunicationRecords WHERE communication_date >= '2021-01-01' AND communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT DISTINCT communication_type FROM CustomerCommunicationRecords ORDER BY communication_type ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_communications FROM CustomerCommunicationRecords GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_communications > 5;
SELECT customer_id, communication_date, communication_content FROM CustomerCommunicationRecords WHERE communication_type IN ('Phone Call', 'Meeting') ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM communication_records WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT communication_date, communication_type FROM communication_records WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY communication_type ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 202;
SELECT * FROM communication_records WHERE communication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_details ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM communication_records WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY communication_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT customer_id, communication_type, communication_details FROM communication_records JOIN customer_details ON communication_records.customer_id = customer_details.customer_id WHERE customer_details.first_name = 'John' AND customer_details.last_name = 'Doe' ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, communication_type, communication_date FROM communication_records WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND communication_type = 'Phone' ORDER BY communication_date DESC;

SELECT customer_id, communication_type, communication_details FROM communication_records WHERE communication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY customer_id ASC, communication_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, communication_type FROM communication_records GROUP BY communication_type ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, feedback_message FROM feedback;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_notes FROM interactions;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS num_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, f.rating, i.interaction_date FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id JOIN feedback f ON i.interaction_id = f.interaction_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_feedback, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM feedback;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_notes FROM Interaction ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ServiceAgent WHERE agent_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT dept_name, manager_id FROM Department;
SELECT * FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number FROM Customer WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' AND interaction_notes IS NOT NULL;

SELECT Customer.customer_name, Interaction.interaction_date, ServiceAgent.agent_name FROM Customer JOIN Interaction ON Customer.customer_id = Interaction.customer_id JOIN ServiceAgent ON Interaction.interaction_type = ServiceAgent.agent_id;

SELECT Customer.customer_name, Department.dept_name, ServiceAgent.agent_name FROM Customer JOIN Department ON Customer.customer_id = Department.manager_id JOIN ServiceAgent ON Department.manager_id = ServiceAgent.agent_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;

SELECT e.employee_name, i.interaction_description FROM employees e JOIN employee_interactions ei ON e.employee_id = ei.employee_id JOIN interactions i ON ei.interaction_id = i.interaction_id WHERE e.department = 'Sales' AND i.interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
